title: Ombudsman reveals wide range of public service failures across NHS in England and UK government ...
text: ( Source : Office of the Parliamentary and Health Service Ombudsman ) Too many unresolved complaints are being taken to the Parliamentary and Health Service Ombudsman which could have been resolved by public services locally, meaning that
